SYN_4_2_3327: PROCEDURE NOTE: Ms. [REDACTED] presents with a large loculated left pleural effusion. Ultrasound imaging confirmed the presence of thick septations and organized fluid. To promote drainage, fibrinolytic agents (tPA 10mg and DNase 5mg) were instilled into the pleural space via the existing left chest catheter. This marks the initial day of lytic therapy. The patient remained stable throughout the instillation.
